history.narrative: Law 4-113 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 4-407, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 9, 1982 and March 23, 1982, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 12, 1982, it was assigned Act No. 4-176 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
